title: Windows XP Professional SP2 Educational CD: Stock image
description:
Windows XP Professional SP2

This is a dd image of an educational copy of Windows XP Professional SP2. There has been no slipstreams. No mods. No nothing. A completely "clean" copy.

It is an iso, so you may use whatever burning software that fancies you.

This does indeed require activation, registration, and most importantly, a valid serial key; it is not the "corporate" edition. And no, I will not provide a serial key or any cracks in this torrent.
